attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minster to abolish the 50% income tax on earnings over £150,000 that is planned to commence FY 2010/11.
The principle on which this country has always run - capitalism - is being replaced with borderline socialism. People will not stand for it. There are plenty of other countries in the world with less than half that much tax, and skilled persons, businesses and firms that make up the majority of government revenue will leave. Leaving the nation in a state of ruin populated by unskilled and poor persons.
